sentences: The following UNFCCC constituted bodies held meetings since COP-8.
The LDC Expert Group held its third meeting from 3-5 March 2003, in Samoa.
The CDM Executive Board held its seventh and eighth meetings in Bonn from 20-21 January 2003 and 20-21 March 2003, respectively.
The EGTT held its third meeting from 30-31 May 2003.
In addition, pre-sessional consultations were held on 2 June to discuss registries, and the Global Climate Observing System second adequacy report.
